subject: Swimming
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Alcohol Abuse
lead_paragraph: The sport’s national governing body suspended Phelps, a winner of 22 Olympic medals, for six months and barred him from competing in the 2015 world championships.
snippet: The sport’s national governing body suspended Phelps, a winner of 22 Olympic medals, for six months and barred him from competing in the 2015 world championships.
